entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
